trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were 2 other sightings in Austin on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 9:35pm central time, we were at Auditorium Shores in Austin Tx, watching the fireworks show and someone yelled out " a ufo" and we looked up to see this object moving steadily at about 150mph, not sure on the exact speed, through the sky heading NW. This object looked like molten fire. It had a glowing red to it, like molten rock. It was not a meteor and i dont believe it to be a satellite on fire, because i have witnessed that before. It was not a hot air balloon nor an airplane. There were no blinking lights on this object. It was hard to tell the elevation of the object, but its elevation was steady, it was not descending. It disappeared heading Northwest and took about 20 seconds to disappear. This object was not a plane. It freaked my wife and i out, and we were not drinking alcohol when this occurred.
Summary: Molten fire ball flying steadily through TX sky.
